entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
